entry.title: Ptarmigan mainnet release
entry.summary: Hiroki Gondo of the Nayuta team has announced the release of their "Ptarmigan" mainnet version, which is recklessly implemented and compliant with BOLT. This marks the fourth implementation of BOLT compliance. The Nayuta team advises users to only use software that they can afford to lose. The announcement was made via email and includes a link to the Github repository for the Ptarmigan software. The email was sent through ProtonMail Secure Email.
